message: Hello, you can download my slides (pdf) here: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/1977573/crab_introduction.pdf  (Crab- Python Framework for Building Recommender Engines)
Presenters, please remember to send me your slides (stefan@sun.ac.za) or to pop a link to your PDF here... thanks!
